#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int prime[10000001],prime1[10000001];
int main()
{
    int i,j,number_of_primes=0;
    for(j=0;j<10000001;j++)
    {
        prime[j]=1;
    }
    for(j=2;j<10000001;j++)
    {
        if(prime[j]==1)
        {
            prime1[number_of_primes]=j;
            for(i=j;i<10000001;i+=j)
                prime[i]=j;
            number_of_primes++;
        }
    }
   // cout<<prime[3]<<"\n";
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        double bound=sqrt(n);
        long long ans=1;
        long long temp;
        int cur=0;
        while(n>1)
        {
            int e=0;
            int temp1=prime[n];
            if(n%temp1==0)
            {
                while(n%temp1==0)
                {
                n/=temp1;
                e++;
                }
                temp=(long long)pow(temp1,e);
                temp*=temp;
                ans*=(temp-(temp-1)/(1+temp1));
            }
        }
    printf("%lld\n",ans);
    }
}
